query:
SELECT c.id as category_id, c.name as category_name, c.slug, COUNT(p.id) as product_count
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId
GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.slug
ORDER BY c.id;
